item.description:
It's still restaurant week, let's get in 1 more great meal deal !

We've run out of evenings so I'm suggesting a LUNCH !

How about Snookers Billiards, Bar and Grill in Providence

Here's their website

http://www.snookersri.com/

Here's their restaurant week menu offerings

http://www.goprovidence.com/rw/snookers-sports-billiards-bar-and-grille/

We will only be ordering off the restaurant week menu but there's a lot to choose from.

And maybe play a game or two of pool !Â 

Join the fun !

group.name: Rhode Island Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: Lunch - That's Different - at Snookers Sports Bar & Grill
